SECTION.SUBTEXT: The Office of University Communications at the University of Pennsylvania provides access to services and information online in a manner that respects and protects your privacy. This statement describes our information-collection practices and explains how we use and protect your personal information.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Scope
SECTION.SUBTEXT: This statement applies only to information collected by this website.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: What we collect and why
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We collect these types of information about you: Auto-collected information (web logs). The following information is automatically collected: the Internet domain and IP address from which you accessed our website, the date and time of your visit and the pages you visited on our site. This information helps us understand aggregate uses of our site, track usage trends and improve our services but only after any user-identifiable information has been removed.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Cookies
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Cookies are files that many websites transfer to users' hard drives to enable the site to deliver personalized services or to provide persistent authentication. The information contained in a cookie typically includes information collected automatically by the web server and/or information provided voluntarily by the user. Our website uses persistent cookies in conjunction with a third party technology partner to analyze search engine usage and web traffic patterns. This information is used in the aggregate to monitor and enhance the Penn web pages. It is not used to track the usage patterns of individual users.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Security
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Our office is committed to ensuring the security of your information. We have put in place reasonable physical, technical and administrative safeguards designed to prevent unauthorized access to or use of the information collected online.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Sharing your information
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
We will not share your information with third parties except:
as required by law as necessary to protect the University's interests with service providers acting on our behalf who have agreed to protect the confidentiality of the data

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Links to other websites
SECTION.SUBTEXT: This site may contain links to other websites not affiliated with our office. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these other sites, including other University of Pennsylvania sites. We encourage you to read the privacy statements of other sites for assurance that their practices safeguard your privacy.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Changes to Statement
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We reserve the right to modify this privacy statement at any time and will post the changes on this webpage.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Office of Audit, Compliance and Privacy
SECTION.SUBTEXT: Guidelines for creating website privacy statements (PDF file). Contact Penn's Privacy Office at privacy@upenn.edu.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Contact Us
SECTION.SUBTEXT: We welcome suggestions and questions about our privacy statement. Please send them to ucomms-web@pobox.upenn.edu. If you have questions about privacy at Penn overall, please send email to privacy@pobox.upenn.edu or call 1-888-BEN-TIPS (1-888-236-8477).
